    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="es">Triángulos semejantes</string>
            <string language="en">Similar triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnliche Dreiecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Triangles semblables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Triângulos similares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Triangoli simili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρόμοια τρίγωνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones diferentes criterios para determinar si dos triángulos son semejantes o no.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain several criteria for identifying if two triangles are similar or not.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">criterio de semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">criterion of similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulos</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, einige Kriterien für das Kennzeichnen zu erklären, 
wenn zwei Dreiecke oder nicht ähnlich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer plusieurs critères pour identifier si deux 
triangles sont semblables ou pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
diversos critérios para identificar se dois triângulos forem 
similares ou não.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni spiegare
parecchi test di verifica per identificare se due triangoli sono 
simili oppure no.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει διάφορα κριτήρια για τον προσδιορισμό εάν δύο 
τρίγωνα είναι παρόμοια ή όχι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kriterium der Ähnlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
